com.philips.pins.shinelib

Class SHNCentral

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.pins.shinelib.SHNCentral

  • public class SHNCentral
extends Object
    Central class for handling BlueLib initialisation, associating to peripherals and retrieving currently associated peripherals.

    Use a SHNCentral.Builder to construct a SHNCentral. After that add SHNDeviceDefinitionInfo for device types using registerDeviceDefinition(SHNDeviceDefinitionInfo) and then associate with a device type or start scanning for it.

    Applications should create only one instance of SHNCentral.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  SHNCentral.SHNCentralListener
      A listener for changes in the state of SHNCentral.
      static class  SHNCentral.State
      State that the SHNCentral currently is in.

      • getInternalHandler

        public android.os.Handler getInternalHandler()
        Get a Handler that is used to run internal tasks on. To prevent threading issues, Bluelib code runs on a single thread. This function gives access to a handler that executes the tasks on this "internal" thread. This handler should not be used to execute application level code. This function will be removed from the interface in a future version of Bluelib.
        Returns:
        the Handler that is used for internal tasks

      • getUserHandler

        public android.os.Handler getUserHandler()
        Get the Handler that is used to run application level callbacks on.
        Returns:
        the Handler that is used for callbacks
        See Also:
        SHNCentral.Builder.setHandler(Handler)

        public void shutdown()

        This should be called before the object is destroyed by the garbage collector.

      • getVersion

        public String getVersion()
        Get the current BlueLib version. For release version returns the version. For any other version returns short SHA1 hash and SNAPSHOT tag.
        Returns:
        string representation of the BlueLib version

      • registerDeviceDefinition

        public boolean registerDeviceDefinition(SHNDeviceDefinitionInfo shnDeviceDefinitionInfo)
        Add a Device Definition to the SHNDeviceDefinitions managed by SHNCentral. Typically a device definition has a one to one relation to a plugin. By registering the device definition through this function, Bluelib gains support for devices managed by the plugin that contains it.
        Parameters:
        shnDeviceDefinitionInfo - device definition info
        Returns:
